ISSUE.TITLE: "Shopping carts and wishlists" page (admin area). Update hints for the "Start date" and "End date" fields on the
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently it's not clear what these fields mean (how they work). Let's renamed them to the following ones: 1. The start date for the search (when a product was added to the cart) 2. The end date for the search (when a product was added to the cart)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5209 Updated hints for the "Start date" and "End date" fields on the "Shopping carts and wishlists" page
